name: Little mushroom picker
description:
Little mushroom picker

2D platformer created on an open engine Godot. The hero will collect mushrooms in various locations: from the Deep Forest to the Desert or Cemetery. Difficult obstacles and hungry inhabitants of the forest lurk on the way.

Control

D or Right Arrow - Forward,

A or Left Arrow - Backward,

W or Up arrow - jump,

Space -  cut mushroom,

E - Shot.

For the manufacture of euthanizing bullets, it is necessary: 1 edible mushroom and 1 inedible.
